title: Azir
body: I'm confused about whether to build grail or morellos followed by a nashors on Azir. Opinions?

replies.body: You'll notice a lot of pro players don't even get Nashor's. I have never played Azir before, and don't know exactly how auto reliant he is though. Just something for you to think about.

i on azir generally get chalace, get stinger, finish athenes, finish nashors, get a morellonomomomicon soc boots, then my personal pick for last item is will of the ancients (to balance out the crazy squishy, that azir is)
then final (final) item get whatever is needed
Depends on the matchup, I think Morellos is usually the go-to but if they have a leblanc or heavy ap comp grail..
